MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L31 postcode area of Melling, affecting properties in Brewery Lane, Spencers Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:30AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 02:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 01:15AM on 29th March 2021.
